sources.title: Bu bu zhui zong (1974)
sources.description: Two circus performers are tasked with escorting relief in the form of gold bullion to a region hit by drought. On the way they are beset by countless bandits. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bu-bu-zhui-zong-1974/

metadata.Plot: Two circus performers are tasked with escorting relief in the form of gold bullion to a region hit by drought. On the way they are beset by countless bandits.
metadata.Actors: Barry Chan, Shu-Lin Chang, Chung-Lien Chou
